title: Designing Student Engagement and Retention Strategies for Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and communication skills for work-related contexts
context.additional_context: As working professionals, learners must balance work and study while progressing in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can voluntarily log in to the online learning platform at least three times per week and participate in learning activities.
Learners engage in meaningful interactions (e.g., discussions, feedback exchange) through communication channels with peers and instructors at least twice a month.
Learners submit more than 80% of tasks by the end of the course and achieve a performance rate of over 70% in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
